cgcloud__Tactic__c.name: cgcloud__Tactic__c
cgcloud__Tactic__c.description: Configures the relation between a Promotion and a Tactic.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Absolute_Lift__c.description: Estimated Lift value of the tactic. If the tactic is executed, the Baseline Volume is increased by this volume.

cgcloud__Aggregation_Category__c.description: Aggregation category for the tactic under the promotion.

cgcloud__Anchor__c.description: Anchor of the promotion to which the tactic is related.

cgcloud__Comment__c.description: Stores the comment that describes different tactics.

cgcloud__Compensation_Model__c.description: Indicates the compensation model for the tactic execution.

cgcloud__Condition_Creation_Levels__c.description: JSON file which contains a list of effective product levels.

cgcloud__Condition_Maintenance__c.description: Defines the action on the conditions that the tactic generates.

cgcloud__Create_Default_Conditions__c.description: Indicates whether the system needs to create the default tactic condition creation definitions for the tactics when this tactic is saved in the database.

cgcloud__Custom1_Date_From__c.description: Refers to the start of a project-specific time range.

cgcloud__Custom1_Date_Thru__c.description: Refers to the end of a project-specific time range.

cgcloud__Custom2_Date_From__c.description: Refers to the start of a project-specific time range.

cgcloud__Custom2_Date_Thru__c.description: Refers to the end of a project-specific time range.

cgcloud__Date_From__c.description: Start of a project-specific time range. For example, pre-dip.

cgcloud__Date_Thru__c.description: End of a project-specific time range. For example, pre-dip.

cgcloud__Effective_Brands__c.description: Effective brands of the tactic. The field stores a list of sfIds of effective brands that are calculated from the effective SKUs or LDPs of the tactic.

cgcloud__Effective_Categories__c.description: Effective categories of the tactic. The field stores a list of sfIds of effective categories that are calculated from the effective SKUs or LDPs of the tactic.

cgcloud__ExternalId__c.description: Reference to the promotion ID that the external system uses to import tactic-specific actuals into the offplatform back end.

cgcloud__Filter_Criteria__c.description: Text field that stores the .json file that's used to apply product filters.

cgcloud__Fund_Template__c.description: Fund Type of the funds that are automatically assigned to the tactic.

cgcloud__Instore_Date_From__c.description: Instore start date of a tactic

cgcloud__Instore_Date_Thru__c.description: Instore end date of a tactic.

cgcloud__LE_Spend__c.description: LE Spend KPI value that's to be distributed to the associated tactic funds based on the funding percentage.

cgcloud__Liabilities__c.description: Liability Accrual KPI value that's to be distributed to the associated tactic funds based on the funding percentage.

cgcloud__Lift_Type__c.description: Type of lift of the tactic.

cgcloud__Lift_Value__c.description: Value of the lift type (fixed or percentage value).

cgcloud__OI_Costs__c.description: Link to the tactic in the parent promotion that created this tactic.

cgcloud__Parent_Tactic__c.description: Link to the tactic in the parent promotion that created this tactic.

cgcloud__Payment_Method__c.description: Payment method that a business partner uses to pay the costs due to the tactic execution.

cgcloud__Pct_of_Stores__c.description: Percentage of stores that participate in the tactic.

cgcloud__Pending_Amount__c.description: Amount that's pending to be paid.

cgcloud__Promotion_Description__c.description: Slogan of the promotion to which this tactic is assigned.

cgcloud__Promotion_Phase__c.description: Phase of the promotion to which this tactic is assigned.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Tactic when accessed from the related list of the Promotion object.

cgcloud__Scenario_Participation__c.description: Indicates the scenarios to which the tactic belongs.

cgcloud__Shipment_Date_From__c.description: Shipment start date of a tactic.

cgcloud__Tactic_Type__c.description: Label of the Tactic Template of this tactic.

cgcloud__Tier_Definition__c.description: Text field that stores the .json file that's used to define the tiers of the tactic.

cgcloud__To_Date_Paid_Amount__c.description: Total amount paid until the current date.

cgcloud__Total_Plan_Spend__c.description: Sum of all plan spends of funds.
